title: Can you steer/turn a sol's Q?
body: I've been told by some friends that you can steer a sol's q, is this possible? I've played him myself and have never seen this happen. if anyone can show proof of this via footage or video it would be good as I really want to prove them wrong. thanks if you do.

replies.body:
It only goes in the direction you cast it, so technically no it can't turn, but with a placement just to the right/left of AuSol's main body it appears like its turning, when in fact its not

Turning is a Visual Illusion
